plugins.name: Delete Any Layer
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to tedious deletion tasks and hello to efficiency with Delete Any Layer, a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow.


This plugin empowers you to effortlessly delete all items (including hidden and locked) within a selected region. Simply follow these steps:


  1. Select the target region: Define the area where you want to delete items. This could be a freehand selection or an already existing frame or group.
  2. Type the item name: Enter the name of the element you want to remove.
  3. Witness the magic: Select Type Delete instantly identifies and removes all matching items within the chosen region.


Benefits:

  1. Unmatched precision: Say goodbye to accidental deletions! The plugin only removes items with the exact name you specify.
  2. Effortless batch deletion: No more manually selecting and deleting items one by one. This plugin handles it all with ease.
  3. Enhanced efficiency: Save valuable time and effort, allowing you to tackle projects faster than ever before.
plugins.tagline: Delete visible, hidden and locked layers with a click!

plugins.name: Crafty ◦ Your Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
Find the perfect voice for your copy.


Crafty is your smart writing assistant that helps you write optimal copy right here in Figma. 

How does it work? 

  • Enter your input copy
  • Choose a style for your copy (Friendly, Formal, Playful)
  • Hit generate and let Crafty do its magic.


Note: We’re currently in limited beta. Sign up for a free 7 day trial to start using :)

plugins.name: RGB Color Picker:
plugins.description:
A color wheel is a circular representation of colors, typically made up of 12 hues. It's a fundamental tool in many fields like art, design, and printing, as it helps us understand how colors relate to each other.


RYB (Red, Yellow, Blue): This is the traditional painters' color wheel used for mixing physical paints.


RGB (Red, Green, Blue): This is the color model used for displays like TVs and computer screens.


CMYK (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black): This is the color model used for printing.

accepted.name: Color Creator
accepted.description:
This page would be your one-stop shop for all things UI/UX creativity and a treasure trove of tools to elevate your designs.

www.beforepost.com

plugins.tagline: RGB: The language of color. Speak it fluently.

plugins.name: Figma to Jitera Studio (Beta)
plugins.description:
Convert Figma designs to Jitera Studio with love.


How does it work

1) Install the plugin

2) In Figma hit cmd+/ and search "Figma to Jitera Studio" and hit enter

3) Select a layer you want to export


Limitations

Exporting designs to code are a best-effort process. Even getting 90% there can save you a ton of time, only having to clean up a few things.


If you find any issues or have feedback at all please contact us.
plugins.tagline: Import Figma designs into Jitera Studio.

plugins.name: Handwritten Scribe Generator
plugins.description:
The Handwritten Scribe Generator is a Figma plugin that lets you create customizable handwritten scribbles in your designs. This user-friendly tool offers adjustable sliders to control the scribble's appearance.

Features:

  • Generate realistic handwritten scribbles
  • Adjust scribble density, amplitude, and loop count


Use the Handwritten Scribe Generator to add a personal touch to your projects with hand-drawn elements.
plugins.tagline: Draw scribble pointers between elements

plugins.name: Word Art Generator
plugins.description:
Word Art Generator


The Word Art Generator is a Figma plugin designed for designers, helping you effortlessly create creative text effects with customizable textures and shapes. Leveraging AI-driven image generation technology, this plugin gives text a unique visual expression, seamlessly integrating your inspiration into your design projects.


Key Features


- Generate unique creative text with customizable textures and shapes

- Multi-language support (English and Chinese)

- AI-assisted texture and shape effects generation

- Extensive customizable output settings (aspect ratio, texture style, font selection)

- Multiple image generation with preview and selection capabilities

- Drag and drop functionality, allowing instant integration into your design


创意文字生成器专为设计师打造，帮助你轻松生成具有可自定义纹理和形状的创意文字效果。利用 AI 驱动的图像生成技术，该插件赋予文字独特的视觉表现，将灵感高效融入您的设计作品中。


主要特点


- 生成独特的、具有可自定义纹理和形状的创意文字

- 多语言支持（英语和中文）

- AI 辅助生成纹理和形状效果

- 丰富的自定义输出设置（宽高比、纹理风格、字体选择）

- 多图像生成和预览、选择功能

- 拖放功能，让生成的图像即刻应用到您的设计当中
plugins.tagline: Word Art Generator using AI to create creative text effects with customizable textures and shapes.

plugins.name: Export Figma variables
plugins.description:
Plugin exports variables to ts-code or css-code. Ts-code is especially useful if you use css-in-js libraries.


The plugin implies that you have base, semantic and component layers of variables. Component layer can use variables from other layers and reference on variables from its own layer. Semantic layer should only use variables from the base layer.


For example, base layer can have variables like color/blue/100, color/blue/200, color/red/100 for colors and space/100, space/100 for spacings and so on.


Semantic layer can have variables like color/primary, color/on-primary and so on. All variables should use variables from base layer.


Component layer must have variables grouped by components like button/color/text, button/color/bg, button/color/bg-hover, tooltip/color/text and so on. Top-level groups must be named by component names. These ones will be used for generating corresponding file names.


Usage


If you want to generate code for semantic layer you should specify only base collection. The component collection must be empty. The plugin generates two files: variables.css and variables.ts.


If you want to generate code for component layer you should specify base collection and component collection as well. In this case, plugin generates files only with ts-code.
plugins.tagline: A plugin for exporting figma variables to css and ts

97583.name: Export Figma variables
97583.description:
Plugin exports variables to ts-code or css-code. Ts-code is especially useful if you use css-in-js libraries.


The plugin implies that you have base, semantic and component layers of variables. Component layer can use variables from other layers and reference on variables from its own layer. Semantic layer should only use variables from the base layer.


For example, base layer can have variables like color/blue/100, color/blue/200, color/red/100 for colors and space/100, space/100 for spacings and so on.


Semantic layer can have variables like color/primary, color/on-primary and so on. All variables should use variables from base layer.


Component layer must have variables grouped by components like button/color/text, button/color/bg, button/color/bg-hover, tooltip/color/text and so on. Top-level groups must be named by component names. These ones will be used for generating corresponding file names.


Usage


If you want to generate code for semantic layer you should specify only base collection. The component collection must be empty. The plugin generates two files: variables.css and variables.ts.


If you want to generate code for component layer you should specify base collection and component collection as well. In this case, plugin generates files only with ts-code.
97583.tagline: A plugin for exporting figma variables to css and ts

plugins.name: Sync variables
plugins.description:
Import/export your Figma variables to as simple as CSS variables.

Would love to hear your feedback.


Supported Features

  1. Mode: Facilitates theme variation with -dark suffixed variables.
  2. All variable types are supported: color, string, number, boolean
  3. Update Matching Collections: Prevents duplicate collections by updating existing ones.
  4. Alias Support: Maintains Figma aliases in import/export process(as a CSS variable).
  5. Length unit supported: px and rem length units are supported.
  6. Description supported in both import and export


Export Functionality

  1. Exports CSS variables from any collections or modes
  2. Numbers format supported: px, rem
  3. Color format supported: rgba, hex, hsl
  4. Alias are preserved
  5. Prefix and postfix option available.


Import Functionality

  1. Import variables in either new collection or update an existing collection.
  2. Associates Figma aliases with their CSS variables var(--variable), ensuring consistency across the design system.
  3. All variables are supported


A simple CSS file variables work for import

:root {
--color-bg-dark: hsl(0, 69%, 67%);
--color-bg-brand-dark: #0c8ce9;
--color-bg-brand-hover-dark: #0a6dc2;
--color-bg-component-dark: #8a38f5;
--color-bg-component-hover-dark: #7a2ed6;
}


This Figma plugin enhances the design-to-development workflow, ensuring a cohesive and efficient transfer of design tokens from Figma to CSS, and is an invaluable asset for managing large-scale design systems or theme variations like light and dark modes.


Powered by yupma.com
plugins.tagline: Import/Export your figma variables to simple CSS variables

plugins.name: Shearer
plugins.description:
A simple tool to shear layers up to ±90° in each axis.


How to use


Select a layer, or group of layers, then use the sliders to adjust the shear angle for both horizontal and vertical axes. The shear transformation is applied in real time and can be adjusted or removed at any time.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
plugins.tagline: A simple tool to shear layers up to ±90° in each axis.

plugins.name: Bionic Reading
plugins.description: Select a text layer & convert it to Bionic Reading - Whats that? Bionic Reading is a new method facilitating the reading process by guiding the eyes through text with artificial fixation points. As a result, the reader is only focusing on the highlighted initial letters and lets the brain center complete the word. Check out bionic-reading.com

plugins.name: Tailwind boilerplate
plugins.description:
Features:

  • responsive font output if using mobile/desktop in the name of the font. EX: heading-1-desktop + heading-1-mobile. This will also work across folders
  • grabs all available font style values such as size, weight, line height, letter spacing, casing, and family.
  • output available in rem and px
  • easy copy paste contents directly into your tailwind.config.js and typography css file
  • customizable breakpoints (defaults to small screen size. See https://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design)
  • outputs all saved color styles




View source code

accepted.name: Half Helix (from Half Helix)
accepted.description: We are a collaborative agency focused on building, growing, and guiding the next generation of ecommerce companies.

plugins.tagline: Converts saved text and color styles into a format ready for use with Tailwindcss.

plugins.name: Figma to Lob (Beta)
plugins.description:
CLOSED BETA - reach out to support@lob.com to be added!

Translate Figma documents into HTML templates for Lob!


Help Page


How to use

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Generate a template from an empty document with selected form factor and size using the "Create Template" button
  3. Design on top of the generated template
  4. For text merge variables, include a variable name enclosed in curly brackets IE {{first_name}}
  5. For image merge variables, enclose the image name in double curly brackets IE {{image_3}}
  6. Once your design is complete, run the plugin again.
  7. Select the desired form factor and size.
  8. Click "Export" at the bottom and save
  9. Unzip the newly created folder
  10. Host the images within the zip to a public url
  11. Open the HTML and modify the background-images to point to their respective public urls.


Hosting Images

You will need to host any assets in the "img" folder of your export. You will then need to reference them within your HTML template. See step 11 of "How to Use"


Disclaimer

Translating Figma into HTML is a best-effort process. Even getting 90% there can save you a ton of time, only having to clean up a few things.
plugins.tagline: Translate Figma documents into HTML templates for Lob!

plugins.name: Link Extractor
plugins.description:
Link Extractor lets you quickly find all hyperlinks in your design files.


Easily browse, then copy the links to where they're needed in your development process.


Functionality

  • Select one or many elements to extract all links contained within
  • Handles multiple links within a single text element
  • Displays the text body that is linked
  • Quickly select, copy, open or focus on any of the extracted URLs
plugins.tagline: Easily grab links out of your designs

44669.release_notes:

- Added controls to (1) focus your viewport on any of the links that were found and (2) open the link in a browser
- Added tags with the name of the frame that the link is contained within to help grouping of related links
- The plugin now immediately pulls out links from the current selection when opened, reducing the need for an extra click

plugins.name: Figmafolio - Export Figma Designs to Live Websites
plugins.description:
⚡ About Figmafolio 

Transform your Figma designs into live, interactive websites in minutes. No coding required!


🎨 Key Features

  1. Instant Publishing: Your Figma design becomes a live website with its own URL in minutes.
  2. Responsive Design: Support for both desktop and mobile views, or publish as a responsive design.
  3. Preserve Interactivity: Maintain all your prototype's transitions, animations, and interactions in the live site.
  4. Real-time Updates: Changes in Figma reflect instantly on your live site.
  5. Custom Domain Support: Use your own domain name for a professional touch.
  6. Password Protection: Secure confidential work or NDA projects.
  7. Multiple Projects: Manage different sites with unique URLs for testing and client sharing.


💡 How to Use the Plugin 

  1. Design in Figma: Create your website or portfolio using Figma’s design tools, including transitions, GIFs, and videos.
  2. Paste Prototype Links: Paste your Figma prototype links for desktop and mobile views (or just one for autolayout designs - enable 'Responsive' in the Figma prototype settings.).
  3. Check Out Your Work: Before publishing, use the preview option to see how your design looks.
  4. Go Live: Just click to publish your website and get your own URL.


💼 Perfect for:

  1. Designers showcasing their portfolio
  2. Startups launching landing pages
  3. Agencies presenting client work
  4. Anyone needing a quick, professional web presence


🌐 Learn More About Figmafolio 

Visit figmafolio.com now to bring your website vision to life!
plugins.tagline: Figma to live websites, effortlessly.

plugins.description:
Copy & paste Figma layers into Macaron, a visual editor for creating Web Components.


  • Select layers you want to copy.
  • Open the plugin.
  • Click "Copy Selected Layers" button.
  • Paste (Command/Control + V) in Macaron.

34915.name: Macaron
34915.description:
Copy & paste Figma layers into Macaron, a visual editor for creating Web Components.


  • Select layers you want to copy.
  • Open the plugin.
  • Click "Copy Selected Layers" button.
  • Paste (Command/Control + V) in Macaron.
34915.release_notes:
Better CSS output
- Support absolute positions
- Support separate border widths
- Export rectangles as SVGs
- Ignore mask layers
- Adjust absolute positions based on parent border widths

plugins.name: Base Grid Line Height Calculator
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows users to quickly and accurately calculate text line height to match the desired base grid pixel. With this plugin, users can easily ensure all text elements in their designs are consistent and look great. The plugin also includes an easy-to-use interface that is intuitive and simple to use. Finally, the plugin saves users time and effort by quickly calculating line heights and ensuring they match the desired base grid pixel.

plugins.name: Pixel Font
plugins.description:
Pixel Font is a powerful text pixelation tool that makes it easy to transform text into unique pixel art styles. With simple settings, you can customize font size, color, and boldness, as well as pixel color, size, spacing, and shape. Whether you're creating retro pixel art or modern design effects, this plugin meets all your needs.


Features include:

  1. Custom Text: Input the text you want to pixelate and adjust the font size and color.
  2. Bold Option: Choose whether to bold the text.
  3. Pixel Settings: Customize pixel color, size, and spacing, and select from different pixel shapes (such as square, circle, triangle, pentagon, star, hexagon).
  4. Insert Image: Export and insert the pixelated image into your design.
plugins.tagline: Pixelate your text and create unique pixel styles!

100138.name: Pixel Font
100138.description:
Pixel Font is a powerful text pixelation tool that makes it easy to transform text into unique pixel art styles. With simple settings, you can customize font size, color, and boldness, as well as pixel color, size, spacing, and shape. Whether you're creating retro pixel art or modern design effects, this plugin meets all your needs.


Features include:

  1. Custom Text: Input the text you want to pixelate and adjust the font size and color.
  2. Bold Option: Choose whether to bold the text.
  3. Pixel Settings: Customize pixel color, size, and spacing, and select from different pixel shapes (such as square, circle, triangle, pentagon, star, hexagon).
  4. Insert Image: Export and insert the pixelated image into your design.
100138.tagline: Pixelate your text and create unique pixel styles!

plugins.name: Translate.photo - Translate your Figma Designs
plugins.description:
Hey developers, designers, translators, and product manager, Ready to Go Global with a Click?


Introducing Translate.photo - Elevate your Figma journey with Translate.photo, the game-changing plugin set to transform how you conquer language barriers in your creative ventures. Seamlessly translate text within your frames into more than 75 languages with just a simple click.


Bid farewell to the tedious process of external translation and clunky copy-pasting – welcome to a smoother, more efficient workflow that lets your creativity shine without limits!


Translate.photo breaks down language barriers and supercharge your design process. Imagine creating digital products that speak to the world, without the back-and-forth emails or endless meetings.


Sounds like a dream? Well, it's about to get real!


How Translate.photo + Figma = Magic


  1. Free Plugin: Snap the Translate.photo plugin into your Figma, you're on your way to translate your figma files.
  2. Pick 'n' Click: Got a design that needs to be translated in different language? Just select document, frame, or layer you wish to translate.
  3. 75+Language : You can choose from 75+language and proceed to translate by clicking the designated button.
  4. Automatic Text Replacement: Experience the seamless transition as Translate.photo automatically replaces all text layers within the chosen frame with the selected language, your design in multiple languages without manual translation efforts.
  5. Linguistic Expert: Want to make sure that translated content is just perfect? Translate.photo plugin offers content proofreading by language Experts.


Get access to 1000's of language and subject matter experts in 75 languages in click of a button.


Why You'll Love It


  1. Saves Time: Skip the hassle of manual translations.
  2. Ensures Accuracy: Get the option for expert proofreading.
  3. Direct In-App Translation: Conveniently translate text inside Illustrator to 75+ languages.
  4. Maintain Design Integrity: Keep your original design layout intact.
  5. Streamlined Workflow: Ideal for designers handling multilingual projects.
  6. Teams : Add your language experts, language approvers at 1 place


And here's the cherry on top: Dive in with a 500-word free trial and see how Translate.photo can transform your Figma workflow. Going global has never been this easy, or this fun!


Ready to take your designs around the world? Let's make it happen with Translate.photo
plugins.tagline: Translate your Figma Designs to 75+ Languages with 1 Click.

plugins.name: Fontfinder
plugins.description: Fontfinder is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers effortlessly identify and count all the unique fonts used within any selected artboard. Whether you're working on a single frame or an entire design system, Fontfinder ensures that you can quickly get a comprehensive list of fonts, making typography management simpler and more organized. This plugin is perfect for ensuring font consistency across your design projects while saving time on font audits.

plugins.name: Visible Property 2
plugins.description:
Visible Property 2 will help you creating documentation for hand off. It will update label following reference's component whenever you call the plugin.


Video Tutorial


https://youtu.be/NoihOB1Z6qM


✨ Quick start:


Select "Generate All Color Styles" in plugin menu. Plugin will create Pantone for all of your Color styles


🐷 How it works:


  1. Define reference element by adding "#" in front of a layer name. For example, "#color"
  2. Defile text element you want to update (#reference + . + method). For example, "#color.fill", "#color.fillRGB", "#color.height" etc.
  3. Call the plugin by typing "cmd + /" -> "visible property 2"


🐯 Tips


You can refer to the parent layer by using "##Parent" or "##TopParent" without inserting a layer name.

For example,

  • ##Parent.name or ##Parent.fill
  • ##TopParent.name or ##TopParent.fill


🦁 Properties:


Fill

  • fill -> #123456 78%
  • fillRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • fillHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillStyle -> DarkBlue
  • fillStyleDescription -> The Description


Stroke

  • stroke -> #123456
  • strokeRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • strokeHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeStyle -> DarkBlue
  • strokeStyleDescription -> The Description


Text

  • font -> Roboto
  • fontWeight -> Bold
  • fontSize -> 12
  • paragraphIndent -> 12
  • paragraphSpace -> 12
  • letterSpace -> 12 or 12%
  • lineHeight -> 12 or 12%
  • textStyle -> Body
  • textStyleDescription -> The Description


Size

  • height -> 32
  • width -> 64


Layer

  • name -> layer name


Component

  • description -> component description


Note: This plugin only supports gradients with default Start/Stop positions


☕️ Love this plugin: buy me a coffee


This plugin is an open-source on github
plugins.tagline: Plugin will help you update text follow component property.

plugins.name: Color picker - Find your perfect shade. Core: Color made simple, made brilliant.
plugins.description:
Light & Wavelengths: Colors are not inherent properties of objects. They arise from the interaction of light and our eyes. Light itself is a form of electromagnetic radiation, and within the visible spectrum (the spectrum we can see), different wavelengths create different color sensations. For example, red has longer wavelengths, while blue has shorter ones.

Eye & Perception: Our eyes have cone cells that respond to different wavelengths, triggering the perception of color. Most humans have three types of cone cells, making us "trichromats." Some individuals have variations in cone cells, leading to color blindness.

accepted.name: Color Creator
accepted.description:
This page would be your one-stop shop for all things UI/UX creativity and a treasure trove of tools to elevate your designs.

www.beforepost.com

plugins.tagline: Find your perfect shade. Core: Color made simple, made brilliant.

Light itself is a form of electromagnetic radiation, and within the visible spectrum (the spectrum we can see), different wavelengths create different color sensations. For example, red has longer wavelengths, while blue has shorter ones.

Eye & Perception: Our eyes have cone cells that respond to different wavelengths, triggering the perception of color. Most humans have three types of cone cells, making us "trichromats." Some individuals have variations in cone cells, leading to color blindness.
123062.tagline: Find your perfect shade. Core: Color made simple, made brilliant.

plugins.name: QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Introducing the QR Code Generator Figma plugin, your go-to tool for effortlessly creating customizable QR codes directly within your Figma designs. This user-friendly plugin empowers designers to generate QR codes with ease, offering a range of customization options to suit your project's unique aesthetic.

Enjoying my free Figma plugin? ☕ Consider buying me a coffee to fuel future development!


Key Features:

  • Color Customization: Tailor the QR code colors to match your design palette. Choose from a spectrum of hues for foreground and background elements.
  • Logo Integration: Elevate your QR codes by seamlessly integrating your brand logo. Ensure a consistent and professional look across all your visual assets.
  • Text Customization: Add a title and subtitle to your QR code to provide context and enhance user engagement. Customize the font, size, and color to align with your design specifications.
  • Multiple formats: The QR Code Generator supports multiple export formats, including PNG, SVG, and JPEG. Easily incorporate your QR codes into various design projects and digital platforms.


Why Choose QR Code Generator:

  • Efficiency: Save time by creating QR codes directly in Figma, eliminating the need for external tools or software.
  • Flexibility: Adapt QR codes to your brand guidelines with flexible customization options for colors, logos, and text.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Streamlined controls and a user-friendly interface make QR code generation accessible to both beginners and experienced designers.
plugins.tagline: Easily create highly customisable QR codes

80338.description:

Enjoying my free Figma plugin? ☕ Consider buying me a coffee to fuel future development!


Key Features:

  • Color Customization: Tailor the QR code colors to match your design palette. Choose from a spectrum of hues for foreground and background elements.
  • Logo Integration: Elevate your QR codes by seamlessly integrating your brand logo. Ensure a consistent and professional look across all your visual assets.
  • Text Customization: Add a title and subtitle to your QR code to provide context and enhance user engagement. Customize the font, size, and color to align with your design specifications.
  • Multiple formats: The QR Code Generator supports multiple export formats, including PNG, SVG, and JPEG. Easily incorporate your QR codes into various design projects and digital platforms.


Why Choose QR Code Generator:

plugins.name: Color Shader
plugins.description:
Color Shader


Enhance your design workflow and efficiency with the Color Shader Figma Plugin. Effortlessly generate vibrant color shades.


  1. Choose a color or input a specific one. Select the number of shades you want to generate.
  2. Directly apply shades to your canvas or create styles for any shade or particular color.
  3. Easily copy or insert CSS or Tailwind CSS code directly into your canvas.


Need assistance ?? Click on Help ??. We value your feedback, which you can provide in the Help section or the comments.


If you encounter any bugs or issues, please leave a message in the Help section or the comments.
plugins.tagline: Now, In Figma Create shades with ease & Get CSS or Tailwind code !!

plugins.name: Knice Slice 🔪
plugins.description:
Knice Slice provides a precise and accurate means of determining the minimal repeating dimensions of a selected object, which can then be optimized for use in the Unity platform. This tool is a valuable asset for those seeking to ensure that their Unity projects are finely tuned and optimized for optimal performance.


Select a rectangle or flattened vector and run!



This function is limited to rectangle and vector objects only.
plugins.tagline: Knice slice provides the smallest repeatable dimensions of the selected object to be used in Unity.

63311.name: Knice Slice 🔪
63311.description:
Knice Slice provides a precise and accurate means of determining the minimal repeating dimensions of a selected object, which can then be optimized for use in the Unity platform. This tool is a valuable asset for those seeking to ensure that their Unity projects are finely tuned and optimized for optimal performance.


Select a rectangle or flattened vector and run!



This function is limited to rectangle and vector objects only.
63311.tagline: Knice slice provides the smallest repeatable dimensions of the selected object to be used in Unity.

plugins.name: Handoff
plugins.description:
Handoff is a set of open-source, end-to-end workflow tools for design and development teams looking to streamline their use of Figma design systems.


The Handoff Figma plugin makes it easy to extract tokens from your components. Use it to annotate your design system, marking components that are ready to be used. Pick which attributes should be extracted from each component layer. Preview foundational and component design tokens in CSS and configure how they are named.


Once your design file is ready, you can export all the tokens and generate a static design documentation site by leveraging Handoff CLI.


Check out the Quick Start Guide.


Find out more.

accepted.name: Brad Mering
accepted.description: We're building open source tooling on the Figma APIs to automate Design to Dev handoff. Building applications for Convertiv.

plugins.tagline: Easily export your styles and components as design tokens.

112816.name: Handoff
112816.description:
Handoff is a set of open-source, end-to-end workflow tools for design and development teams looking to streamline their use of Figma design systems.


The Handoff Figma plugin makes it easy to extract tokens from your components. Use it to annotate your design system, marking components that are ready to be used. Pick which attributes should be extracted from each component layer. Preview foundational and component design tokens in CSS and configure how they are named.


Once your design file is ready, you can export all the tokens and generate a static design documentation site by leveraging Handoff CLI.


Check out the Quick Start Guide.


Find out more.
112816.release_notes: Fixed an issue with deeply nested styles and variables not exporting correctly.
112816.tagline: Easily export your styles and components as design tokens.

plugins.name: Context Switch
plugins.description:
Manage content writing across your team’s product with multiple state using Google Sheets and Airtable.


Context Switch lets people maintain the texting outside the Figma files and directly import the context into the text elements that need to update.


With Context Switch, your team can even maintain multiple state: internationalization: EN 🇺🇸, JP 🇯🇵, TW 🇹🇼... / condition: Normal 🙂, Deep Dive 👩🏻‍💻... at once! and the best of all, Designer control "when" to update the content and don't need to update content manually, plugin helps you do the works!

---

📌 We are still in alpha version, so be careful using it.

📌Support Image switching are on the roadmap.

📝 Setup Note: https://www.notion.so/Figma-Plugin-Context-Switch-Note-a6fe123a69474646b1be29123fb6703a

📧 Email me for any question: me@designtips.today
plugins.tagline: Manage content writing across your team’s product with multiple state using Google Sheets.

56998.description:
Manage content writing across your team’s product with multiple state using Google Sheets and Airtable.


Context Switch lets people maintain the texting outside the Figma files and directly import the context into the text elements that need to update.


With Context Switch, your team can even maintain multiple state: internationalization: EN 🇺🇸, JP 🇯🇵, TW 🇹🇼... / condition: Normal 🙂, Deep Dive 👩🏻‍💻... at once! and the best of all, Designer control "when" to update the content and don't need to update content manually, plugin helps you do the works!

---

📌 We are still in alpha version, so be careful using it.

📌Support Image switching are on the roadmap.

📝 Setup Note: https://www.notion.so/Figma-Plugin-Context-Switch-Note-a6fe123a69474646b1be29123fb6703a

📧 Email me for any question: me@designtips.today
56998.tagline: Manage content writing across your team’s product with multiple state using Google Sheets.

plugins.name: Respresso
plugins.description:
Integration plugin for respresso (https://respresso.io/), which is a collaborative asset management tool for multiplatform projects. You can send your digital assets (texts, images, colors, app icons) into Respresso with a single click.

Please read our documentation before you export assets from Figma: https://github.com/pontehu/respresso-figma

Respresso is free for the time beign and we don't want to change this offer in short time :) Don't waste your time! Use Respresso.

plugins.name: UX Copilot – AI Assistant
plugins.description:
Get 30 min back on every UX task with AI.

Trusted by 800+ designers who ship faster with UX Copilot.


What you’ll achieve with UX Copilot:

  1. Ship polished copy 10× faster – AI Text bulk-edits, translates, or generates placeholder copy in seconds.
  2. Validate ideas on-the-fly – AI Personas answer user-interview questions so you can refine flows before a single usability test.
  3. Spot issues before stakeholders do – Design AI delivers real-time critiques and next-step suggestions as you design.
  4. Answer any UX question instantly – AI Chat gives expert guidance without leaving Figma (no more browser tab hopping).
  5. Kick-start every task with proven prompts – Prompt Library serves up ready-made (and savable) templates so you never start from a blank field.
  6. Annotate screens in seconds – Annotation Kit drops sticky notes, cards, and headers that keep feedback clear and consistent.


Ready to shave 30 minutes off your next UX task? Click “Open in Figma” and try UX Copilot now.
plugins.tagline: Chat, Copy, Personas & instant critiques — in Figma

plugins.name: Use Design Tokens
plugins.description:
⚠️ Available only to early-access users during beta period.


useDesignTokens is a powerful tool for managing your design tokens in a more organized and consistent way. With its easy-to-use interface and powerful features, it allows you to create, organize, and customize your design tokens with ease.


  • Multi-branding: manage design tokens for multiple brands within a single project.


  • Contextual overrides (themes): define contextual overrides for color modes, high contrast modes, density, localization, responsiveness, and more.


  • Token tiers and alias tokens: You can create token tiers, allowing you to split your design tokens into different levels of hierarchy. You can also create alias tokens that reference tokens in other tiers, allowing you to keep your tokens organized and consistent.


  • Alias transforms let you apply transforming rules to the referenced token's value.


  • Composite tokens: Create custom token types by grouping together other tokens


  • Tree structure: organize your design tokens in a tree-like structure, making it easy to navigate and find the tokens you need.


  • Page and frame contexts: apply different contexts for each page or each frame in a page, allowing for greater flexibility and customization.


  • Import and export: useDesignTokens supports the W3C design tokens specification and allows you import and export your tokens in JSON format. 


  • Sync with Figma native styles, GitHub and Gitlab repositories.


  • Team collaboration: everyone in the team can work simultaneously on the same tokens system and see everyone's changes instantly.


Visit usedesigntokens.com for more information.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your design system with contextual and multi-brand design tokens

55712.description:

plugins.name: Frame Creator
plugins.description:
Auto creates frame in numbered sequence, supports multiple screen resolutions as well. Useful for maintaining frames with sequences and preset layouts.


Resolutions Supported

  • Desktop - Supports a fixed nav to the left, and a content area, stacked in 2:1 proportion
  • Tablet - Similar to the desktop, without the fixed nav
  • Mobile - Vertically stacked content

41409.name: Frame Creator
41409.description:

plugins.name: Color DS
plugins.description:
Move, generate and switch your color system with this little helper plugin.


Features


Switch mode

Switch mode allows you to toggle between light and dark mode based on your color library


Generate

Generates and updates semantic color structure based on Figma layers to give designers a visual reference to a complex task


Transfer

Copy and paste color styles from one file to another


Read the documentation for more info


Feel free to buy me a coffee ☕️

accepted.name: Eddy Salzmann
accepted.description: Product Designer with a passion for design tools and work optimization

plugins.name: CouchCursor
plugins.description:
Stop being the lazy one in a group project. Be the cool one with just one drag and drop. Choose your favorite designer sofa and invite your collaborator to chill with you. This is the perfect plugin to avoid cursor burnout. Just drag and drop it into a safe place on your disorganized canva.

Original idea by @jeffreykam on Twitter
plugins.tagline: Tired of renaming your layers? Choose a comfortable sofa to relax your cursor.

plugins.name: Bgwrap - Background Remover
plugins.description:
BGWrap is your fast and reliable background remover built for speed and precision. Remove backgrounds from individual or bulk images with just a click. Whether you're preparing product photos, social media visuals, or clean design assets, BGWrap delivers clean cutouts that keep your subject sharp and distraction-free.


Supports batch background removal


High-accuracy subject detection


Ideal for eCommerce, marketing, and design workflows


Simple, seamless, and ready to use
plugins.tagline: Remove Backgrounds. Retain Clarity. Instantly.

plugins.name: Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level Calculator
plugins.description:
Measure readability of your copy with this Flesch-Kincaid grade level calculator. Select a text layer, and then open the plug-in.


The Flesch Reading Ease Readability Formula is a general formula suitable for all kind of texts. It's especially great for:


  • Writing copy for your website
  • Writing copy for user interfaces
  • Advertising your product
  • Writing headlines and taglines
  • Producing terms and conditions that don’t confuse
  • Boosting your SEO performance
  • Communicating your research to a non-specialist audience


Simply select copy with punctuation to receive your score.


Changelog

V0.1 - Initial Release

V0.2 - Added warning pop-up if all or some of copy selected does not have punctuation

plugins.name: Accessibility Design Tools
plugins.description:
The Accessibility Design Tools Figma plugin offers a subset of annotations of the Accessibility Design Tools for Figma library.


They are intended to annotate accessibility-relevant information in application and control visual and interaction design before handover to development.


  • Github sources for this project
  • Full Accessibility Design Tools Documentation
  • Feedback: a11ydesigntools@sap.com
plugins.tagline: Plugins and Accessibility Annotations for Designers
